Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.SECRET.From Viceroy, Foreign Department, .10/// July .1.918. (Received I Till, 12.15 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. On 13th, Nariivji in Peshawar district attacked by Chamlawal Laslikar in connection with old quarrel. Laslikar driven oil by villager;-; who lost two killed, one missing. Matter not considered important. Rest of frontier quiet.
